trans-unit.source: For this property to return `true`, all validation server controls in the current validation group must validate successfully.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性來傳回`true`，必須成功驗證目前的驗證群組中的所有驗證伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: You should check this property only after you have called the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or set the `CausesValidation` property to `true` in the `OnServerClick` event handler for an ASP.NET server control that initiates form processing.
trans-unit.target: 只有已呼叫後，您應該檢查此屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或一組`CausesValidation`屬性`true`中`OnServerClick`初始化表單處理的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These server controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> classes.
trans-unit.target: 這些伺服器控制項包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: If you force validation of a validation group using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method, then all validation controls in the specified validation group must validate successfully as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您強制執行的驗證群組使用驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>方法，則指定的驗證群組中的所有驗證控制項都必須成功驗證也。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if page validation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果頁面驗證成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The IsValid property is called before validation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: IsValid 屬性是在發生驗證之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面內容中儲存的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Use the Items property to store objects with the same lifetime as the page request.
trans-unit.target: 將具有相同的存留期的物件儲存為頁面要求中使用的項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以將物件加入至<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Objects added to the Items property are available throughout the lifetime of the page, so you can add objects to the Items property in events early in the page life cycle and access those objects in later events.
trans-unit.target: 讓您可以在頁面生命週期的早期，將物件加入至事件中的項目屬性，並存取這些物件在更新事件使用存留期中的頁面上，加入到此項目屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含頁面內容中所儲存的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale identifier for the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 設定的地區設定識別碼<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>與頁面相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `LCID` attribute can be set in the directive of the .aspx file, however, the preferred method of setting the locale identifier is through the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `LCID`屬性可以設定在.aspx 檔案的指示詞中，不過，設定的地區設定識別碼的慣用的方法是透過使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier to pass to the <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定識別碼傳遞給<xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs at the end of the load stage of the page's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在載入網頁的生命週期的階段結束時發生。

trans-unit.source: The LoadComplete event occurs after all postback data and view-state data is loaded into the page and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A> method has been called for all controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 所有的回傳資料後就會發生 LoadComplete 事件和檢視狀態資料載入至網頁，而之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>頁面上的所有控制項已都呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Loads any saved view-state information to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 任何儲存的檢視狀態資訊的載入<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> property to load any saved view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium 方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName>所參考物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A>屬性載入任何儲存的檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two descendents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class that saves state in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> object associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包含兩個下階的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>ASP.NET 網頁中包含隱藏欄位中儲存狀態資訊的類別和<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>儲存狀態中的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A>與要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 若要將狀態儲存在您選擇的位置，您應該建立新的子系<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>儲存和載入至持續性媒體狀態，您所選擇的類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立新的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>物件，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to load the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state from anything other than a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用.NET Framework 版本為 1.0 或 1.1，覆寫這個方法，如果您想要載入<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>從隱藏的欄位以外的任何狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇這樣做，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>

trans-unit.source: The saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 儲存的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to return the user to the same position in the client browser after postback.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在回傳後返回用戶端瀏覽器中的相同位置的使用者。

trans-unit.source: This property replaces the obsolete <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取代過時<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation*>

trans-unit.source: When Web pages are posted back to the server, the user is returned to the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 當網頁回傳至伺服器時，使用者會傳回到頁面頂端。

trans-unit.source: On long Web pages, this means that the user has to scroll the page back to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 長的 Web 網頁上，這表示使用者必須捲動頁面回傳至頁面上的最後一個位置。

trans-unit.source: When the MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack property is set to `true`, the user is instead returned to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 當 MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack 屬性設定為`true`，使用者會改為傳回的最後一個位置在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: You set the MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack property in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive.
trans-unit.target: 在中設定 MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack 屬性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the client position should be maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該維護用戶端位置;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the physical path that a virtual path, either absolute or relative, or an application-relative path maps to.
trans-unit.target: 擷取虛擬路徑、 絕對或相對的或應用程式的相對路徑會對應至實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>表示虛擬路徑。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The physical path associated with the virtual path or application-relative path.
trans-unit.target: 與應用程式的相對路徑的虛擬路徑相關聯的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the master page that determines the overall look of the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得主版頁面，決定整體網頁的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The Master property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: 主要屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>此頁面相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>

trans-unit.source: The Master property is valid only on pages that reference a master page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 內容無效，只在主版頁面的參考中的主版頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you access the Master property on a page that does not reference a master page, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果您存取主要屬性未參考主版頁面的頁面上`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a master page are not available until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面的內容不會等到之後，才能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>在引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MasterPage"></xref> associated with this page if it exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MasterPage"> </xref>與此頁面上已有相關聯，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定主版頁面的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property is a virtual path (from the root of the application) of the master page file associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: MasterPageFile 屬性是透過此頁面相關聯的主版頁面檔案虛擬路徑 （來自應用程式根目錄）。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property can be set only in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event; attempting to set the MasterPageFile property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 可以只在中設定的 MasterPageFile 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件; 正在嘗試設定之後的 MasterPageFile 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件將會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: If the MasterPageFile property is not valid, an exception of type <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown later in the page life cycle, but no exception is thrown when the property is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MasterPageFile 屬性無效，例外狀況型別的<xref:System.Web.HttpException>稍後頁面生命週期中，會擲回但設定屬性時，會擲回任何例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: Pages that have the MasterPageFile property set are content pages, and therefore can contain only top-level controls that are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> controls.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的 MasterPageFile 屬性設定內容頁面，而且可以包含只有最上層控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The MasterPageFile property is set after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref> event is complete.
trans-unit.target: MasterPageFile 屬性設定後<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref>事件完成時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面的 [狀態] 欄位的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: When the MaxPageStateFieldLength property is set to a positive number, the view state sent to the client browser is broken into multiple hidden fields, and each field's value is less than the size specified in the MaxPageStateFieldLength property.
trans-unit.target: 當 MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性設定為正數時，傳送到用戶端瀏覽器的檢視狀態分為多個隱藏的欄位，而且每個欄位的值小於 MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性中指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MaxPageStateFieldLength property to a negative number (the default) indicates that the view-state field should not be separated into chunks.
trans-unit.target: MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性設定為負數 （預設值），表示檢視狀態欄位不應該分隔成多個區塊。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MaxPageStateFieldLength to a small number may result in poor performance.
trans-unit.target: MaxPageStateFieldLength 設定為較小的數字，可能會導致效能不佳。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of the MaxPageStateFieldLength property in the of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 設定中 MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性的值位於 Web.config 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length, in bytes, for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組為單位，在頁面的 [狀態] 欄位的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1。

trans-unit.source: The MaxPageStateFieldLength property is not equal to -1 or a positive number.
trans-unit.target: MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性不等於-1 或正數。

trans-unit.source: The MaxPageStateFieldLength property was set after the page was initialized.
trans-unit.target: 已初始化頁面之後，已設定 MaxPageStateFieldLength 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "description" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容的 「 描述 」 <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""> </xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`項目可以用來改善搜尋引擎清單。

trans-unit.source: The "description" `meta` element is used by some search engines to improve listing previews.
trans-unit.target: 「 描述 」`meta`項目可由某些搜尋引擎來改善清單預覽。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "description" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何 「 描述 」`meta`中的項目`head`網頁標記中，項目`meta`項目新增至網頁中呈現網頁時。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "description" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁標記中已經有 「 描述 」`meta`項目，這個屬性取得或設定`content`屬性`meta`項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指示詞中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "description" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 「 描述 」 的內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""></xref> element with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 頁面沒有標頭控制項 ( <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""> </xref>具有項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref>屬性設為 「 伺服器 」)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "keywords" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的 「 關鍵字 」 內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`項目可以用來改善搜尋引擎清單。

trans-unit.source: The "keywords" `meta` element is either not used at all or is given very little weight by the major search engines.
trans-unit.target: 「 關鍵字 」`meta`項目未使用完全或由主要的搜尋引擎提供極少的權重。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "keywords" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何 「 關鍵字 」`meta`中的項目`head`網頁標記中，項目`meta`項目新增至網頁中呈現網頁時。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "keywords" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁標記中已經有 「 關鍵字 」`meta`項目，這個屬性取得或設定`content`屬性`meta`項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指示詞中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "keywords" <xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 「 關鍵字 」 內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_meta" name="meta" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""></xref> element with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 頁面沒有標頭控制項 ( <xref uid="langword_csharp_head" name="head" href=""> </xref>具有項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_runat" name="runat" href=""></xref>屬性設為 「 伺服器 」)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the model binding execution context.

trans-unit.source: The model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 模型繫結執行內容。

trans-unit.source: If the model binding execution context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, a new one is created and returned.

trans-unit.source: Gets the model state dictionary object that contains the state of the model and of model-binding validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得模型狀態字典物件，其中包含模型和模型繫結驗證的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.target: 模型狀態字典物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event to initialize the page.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件，以初始化頁面。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法用來執行初始設定和安裝所需的步驟來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此階段網頁的生命週期中，宣告的伺服器頁面上的控制項會初始化為其預設狀態。不過，每個控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls.
trans-unit.target: 頁面上的控制項無法存取其他伺服器控制項在頁面上的`Page_Init`階段中的，不論其他控制項是否為子系或父控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A> method and before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A>方法之前<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnInit 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete"></xref> event after page initialization.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete"></xref>頁面初始化之後的事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnInitComplete method is called after page initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 網頁初始化完成後，會呼叫 OnInitComplete 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's view state is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在網頁的生命週期的這個階段，所有宣告都已初始化頁面上的控制項，但尚未填入網頁的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取伺服器控制項，但它們尚未包含從使用者傳回的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The OnInitComplete method occurs at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> initialization stage and before the load stage.
trans-unit.target: OnInitComplete 方法結尾處，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>初始化階段，以及載入階段之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad"></xref> event after postback data is loaded into the page server controls but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad*> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreLoad"></xref>事件前載入至網頁伺服器控制項的回傳資料之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad*>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad*>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreLoad method is called after all postback data returned from the user is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 載入 OnPreLoad 後所有回傳資料從使用者傳回呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: At this stage in the page's life cycle, view-state information and postback data for declared controls and controls created during the initialization stage are loaded into the page's controls.
trans-unit.target: 在這個階段中網頁的生命週期中，檢視狀態資訊和回傳資料宣告控制項和初始化階段時建立載入網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Controls created in the OnPreLoad method will also be loaded with view-state and postback data.
trans-unit.target: 也可使用檢視狀態和回傳資料中載入 OnPreLoad 方法中建立的控制項。

trans-unit.source: At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created and the page is ready to render the output.

trans-unit.source: This is the last event called before the page's view state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 這是網頁的檢視狀態儲存之前呼叫的最後一個事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete"></xref> event after the page state has been saved to the persistence medium.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete"></xref>事件之後的頁面狀態已儲存至持續性中。

trans-unit.source: The OnSaveStateComplete method is called when the state information for the control has been written to the persistence medium for the page.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的狀態資訊已寫入至持續性媒體頁面時，會呼叫 OnSaveStateComplete 方法。

trans-unit.source: State information is written to the persistence medium by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 狀態資訊就會寫入持續性媒體中，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the adapter that renders the page for the specific requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得呈現特定要求的瀏覽器的頁面配置器。

trans-unit.source: The PageAdapter property returns the specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object that modifies the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object for the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: PageAdapter 屬性會傳回特定<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>可修改的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>要求瀏覽器物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object is determined by examining characteristics of the incoming <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 特定<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>物件檢查內送的特性來判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: When an adapter is chosen for the request, any life cycle events on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter> object override the corresponding events on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: 當配接器會選擇任何生命週期事件，在要求上<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>物件上覆寫對應的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter"></xref> that renders the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter"> </xref>呈現的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref>與頁面相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 要求和回應會原本是無狀態。

trans-unit.source: To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state.
trans-unit.target: 若要維護之間的 HTTP 要求的狀態，可以儲存伺服器的 ASP.NET 網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態下，稱為檢視狀態包含網頁、 控制項設定和資料，讓網頁及控制項顯示如同它們是相同的使用者所看到和其最後一個的來回行程的頁面互動。

trans-unit.source: Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page.
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存檢視狀態相同的頁面上的連續要求之間，有多個機制。

trans-unit.source: The abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別代表這些狀態的儲存機制的基底類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: Page developers will typically not need to use the PageStatePersister property.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員通常不需要使用 PageStatePersister 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The PageStatePersister property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: PageStatePersister 屬性主要由控制項開發人員擴充的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>和功能使用

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"></xref> associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister"> </xref>與頁面相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the EVENTARGUMENT hidden field in the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現的頁面定義 EVENTARGUMENT 隱藏的欄位的字串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the EVENTTARGET hidden field in the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: 在呈現的頁面定義 EVENTTARGET 隱藏的欄位的字串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before page initialization.
trans-unit.target: 網頁初始化之前發生。

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您檢查條件，頁面要求，例如網頁是否正在載入中回傳的回應。

trans-unit.source: You can also check the values of profile properties.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以檢查設定檔屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 事件可讓您設定稍後用於頁面生命週期的值。

trans-unit.source: You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以動態設定主版頁面或 [要求] 頁面的佈景主題和建立動態控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the PreInit event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何將 PreInit 事件放入 ASP.NET 存留週期的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the page <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 頁面之前，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The PreLoad event is raised after all postback data processing and before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 預先載入事件會在所有的回傳資料處理之後，以及之前引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>

trans-unit.source: There is a second attempt to load postback data before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 第二個嘗試載入之前的回傳資料<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the page content is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面的內容轉譯之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The PreRenderComplete event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete.
trans-unit.target: 網頁的生命週期的呈現前階段完成時，會引發 PreRenderComplete 事件。

trans-unit.source: At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面生命週期的這個階段，所有控制項已都建立、 完成的任何所需的分頁，並且頁面已準備好呈現給輸出。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 這是網頁的檢視狀態儲存之前，所引發的最後一個事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the page that transferred control to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項傳送至目前頁面的頁面。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method or use cross-page posting to transfer processing from one ASP.NET page to another, the originating page contains request information that might be required for the destination page.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法或要從一個 ASP.NET 網頁的處理傳送到另一個使用跨網頁傳回，起始頁包含可能需要的目的地 頁面上的要求資訊。</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the PreviousPage property to access that information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [上一頁] 屬性來存取該資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the current page is being rendered as a result of a direct request (not a transfer or cross-post from another page), the PreviousPage property contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前頁面所呈現的 （不傳送或跨 post，從另一頁） 的直接要求而上一頁屬性包含`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> representing the page that transferred control to the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref>表示控制項傳送至目前頁面的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The current user is not allowed to access the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用者不是允許存取前一頁。

trans-unit.source: -or- ASP.NET routing is in use and the previous page's URL is a routed URL.
trans-unit.target: -或-ASP.NET 路由使用中前, 一頁的 URL 是路由的 URL。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET checks access permissions, it assumes that the URL is an actual path to a file.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 會檢查存取權限時，它會假設 URL 是實際檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Because this is not the case with a routed URL, the check fails.
trans-unit.target: 因為這不是使用路由 URL 的情況下，檢查將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Sets the intrinsic server objects of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Request*>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Response*>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Application*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定的內建伺服器物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件，例如<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<> *> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should not call this method.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request*>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response*>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>提供內建伺服器物件的參考的物件 (例如， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>) 用來服務 HTTP 要求。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session*>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that caused the postback that it should handle an incoming postback event.
trans-unit.target: 通知伺服器控制項造成回傳，它應該處理內送的回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object calls the RaisePostBackEvent method when a postback occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>回傳發生時，物件會呼叫 RaisePostBackEvent 方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫發生在頁面生命週期中載入和變更的通知完成後，但尚未發生之前。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET server control that caused the postback.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 伺服器控制項造成回傳。

trans-unit.source: This control must implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項必須實作<xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: 回傳的引數。

trans-unit.source: Declares a value that is declared as an ECMAScript array declaration when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 宣告呈現網頁時，宣告為 ECMAScript 陣列宣告的值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used by script-based controls to declare themselves within an array so that a client script library can work with all the controls of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用指令碼為基礎的控制項，來宣告本身在陣列中，如此用戶端指令碼程式庫可以使用相同類型的所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterArrayDeclaration method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterArrayDeclaration 方法已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>的方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterArrayDeclaration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the array in which to declare the value.
trans-unit.target: 在其中宣告值陣列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to place in the array.
trans-unit.target: 要放置在陣列中的值。

trans-unit.source: Registers a new asynchronous task with the page.
trans-unit.target: 與網頁註冊新的非同步工作。

trans-unit.source: Define an asynchronous task using the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask> class.
trans-unit.target: 定義非同步工作使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask>

trans-unit.source: When the task is defined, use the RegisterAsyncTask method to register the task with the page.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作時，使用 RegisterAsyncTask 方法註冊頁面中的工作。

trans-unit.source: After registering the task, invoke the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A> method to begin the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 在註冊之後的工作，叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A>方法開始非同步工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RegisterAsyncTask method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages.
trans-unit.target: RegisterAsyncTask 方法可以搭配同步和非同步頁面。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask"></xref> that defines the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageAsyncTask"> </xref>定義非同步工作。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous task is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 非同步工作是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Emits client-side script blocks to the response.
trans-unit.target: 會發出至回應的用戶端指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The client-side script is emitted just after the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's `<form runat= server>` element.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼，就會發出後方之開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件的`<form runat= server>`項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: Be sure to include opening and closing `<script>` elements around the script block string specified in the `script` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 務必包含左右`<script>`項目周圍的指令碼區塊中指定的字串`script`參數。

trans-unit.source: Because this method uses a key to identify the script block, the script block does not have to be emitted to the output stream each time it is requested by a different server control instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用索引鍵，來識別指令碼區塊，因為指令碼區塊並沒有發出至輸出資料流每次要求不同的伺服器控制項執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Using a key also decreases the likelihood of different controls' script blocks interfering with each other.
trans-unit.target: 使用金鑰時，也會減少互相干擾的不同控制項的指令碼區塊的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Any script blocks with the same `key` parameter values are considered duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 任何指令碼區塊，具有相同`key`參數值會被視為重複。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Remember to include HTML comment tags around your script so that it will not be rendered if the requesting browser does not support scripts.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 記得 HTML 註解前後加上標記您的指令碼，讓它將無法呈現如果要求的瀏覽器不支援指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterClientScriptBlock method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterClientScriptBlock 方法已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 識別指令碼區塊的唯一索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Content of script that is sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至用戶端的指令碼內容。

trans-unit.source: Allows server controls to automatically register a hidden field on the form.
trans-unit.target: 可讓伺服器自動註冊隱藏的欄位在表單上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The field will be sent to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref> server control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位將會傳送至<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件時<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm"></xref>呈現伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterHiddenField method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterHiddenField 方法已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>的方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterHiddenField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unique name of the hidden field to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 要呈現的隱藏欄位的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to be emitted in the hidden form.
trans-unit.target: 要在隱藏的表單中發出的值。

trans-unit.source: Allows a page to access the client <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnSubmit" name="OnSubmit" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 可讓頁面以存取用戶端<xref uid="langword_csharp_OnSubmit" name="OnSubmit" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The script should be a function call to client code registered elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼應該註冊的其他位置的用戶端程式碼的函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterOnSubmitStatement method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterOnSubmitStatement 方法已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>的方法</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterOnSubmitStatement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 識別指令碼區塊的唯一索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The client-side script to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端指令碼傳送到用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as one whose control state must be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 註冊控制項為必須保存其控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Custom server controls that use control state must call the RegisterRequiresControlState method on each request because registration for control state is not carried over from request to request during a postback event.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項狀態的自訂伺服器控制項必須呼叫 RegisterRequiresControlState 方法，每個要求，因為控制項狀態的註冊不會保存從要求的要求期間回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that registration occur in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您註冊，會在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: The control to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control to register is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的控制項是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresControlState method can be called only before or during the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫 RegisterRequiresControlState 方法，只有之前或期間<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control as one that requires postback handling when the page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項註冊為需要回傳處理，當頁面回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The control to be registered must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface or an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊控制項必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>介面或<xref:System.Web.HttpException>，就會引發。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface enables handling of post back data and raising of any post back data changed events.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項時，實作時<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>的回傳資料處理和引發任何使用 post 要求的介面可讓備份資料變更事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the server control event model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關伺服器控制項的事件模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Register controls with the page at or before the `Page_PreRender` event of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 當時或之前的網頁註冊控制項`Page_PreRender`頁面生命週期的事件。

trans-unit.source: The control to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control to register does not implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的控制項不會實作<xref href="System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ASP.NET server control as one requiring an event to be raised when the control is processed on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 為一個需要處理控制項上時引發的事件註冊 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Only one server control can be registered per page request.
trans-unit.target: 只有一部伺服器控制項可以註冊每個頁面要求。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresRaiseEvent must be used when the control does not include its control ID in the form post data.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項不包含其識別碼在表單張貼資料的控制項，則必須使用 RegisterRequiresRaiseEvent。

trans-unit.source: Also, the control that is registered must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此外，已註冊的控制項必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The control to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Registers a control with the page as one requiring view-state encryption.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項的網頁註冊一個要求的檢視狀態加密。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control that deals with potentially sensitive information, call the RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption method to register the control with the page and ensure view state for the control is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在開發處理潛在的敏感資訊的自訂控制項，呼叫 RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption 方法與頁面登錄此控制項，並確保已加密的控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The entire page state will be encrypted if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>.
trans-unit.target: 會加密整個頁面狀態，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption method must be called before or during the page <xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""></xref>phase in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: RegisterRequiresViewStateEncryption 方法必須呼叫之前或期間頁面<xref uid="langword_csharp_PreRender" name="PreRender" href=""></xref>頁面生命週期中階段。

trans-unit.source: Emits a client-side script block in the page response.
trans-unit.target: 發出的頁面回應中的用戶端指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method, the RegisterStartupScript method emits the script just before the closing tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's `<form runat= server>` element.
trans-unit.target: 類似於<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法，RegisterStartupScript 方法發出的結束標記之前的指令碼<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件的`<form runat= server>`項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Be sure to include opening and closing `<script>` elements around the script block string specified in the `script` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 務必包含左右`<script>`項目周圍的指令碼區塊中指定的字串`script`參數。

trans-unit.source: Because this method uses a key to identify the script block, the script block does not have to be emitted to the output stream each time it is requested by a different server control instance Any script blocks with the same `key` parameter values are considered duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用索引鍵，來識別指令碼區塊，因為指令碼區塊並沒有發出至輸出資料流不同的伺服器控制項執行個體具有相同的指令碼區塊要求每次`key`參數值會被視為重複。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Remember to include HTML comment tags around your script so that it will not be rendered if the requesting browser does not support scripts.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 記得 HTML 註解前後加上標記您的指令碼，讓它將無法呈現如果要求的瀏覽器不支援指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterStartupScript method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: RegisterStartupScript 方法已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.RegisterStartupScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unique key that identifies a script block.
trans-unit.target: 識別指令碼區塊的唯一索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Content of script that will be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 將傳送至用戶端的指令碼內容。

trans-unit.source: Causes page view state to be persisted, if called.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫，會導致要保存的頁面檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The RegisterViewStateHandler method is automatically called through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlForm> server control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the current <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的目前值<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁正在執行以回應透過 ASP.NET 路由所提出的要求，這個屬性會提供存取權的 URL 參數值傳遞做為路由資料。

trans-unit.source: If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面執行以回應實體的 URL，而非路由的 URL，這個屬性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取名為 URL 參數的值`year`。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` [C#] ``` int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` [C#]``` int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ```如果路由會定義使用的 URL 模式`{locale}/{year}`網域`contoso.com`，而且如果要求的 URL 是`contoso.com/US/2010`，`year`將包含"2010"執行此程式碼的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需 ASP.NET 路由的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 路由](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the current <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName> instance.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的目前值<xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext?displayProperty=fullName>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state and control-state information for the page.
trans-unit.target: 儲存檢視狀態和控制項狀態的任何資訊頁面。

trans-unit.source: The SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> property to store view-state and control-state information for the page.
trans-unit.target: SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium 方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName>所參考物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A>屬性來儲存網頁的檢視狀態和控制狀態資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two descendents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class that saves state in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> object associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包含兩個下階的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>ASP.NET 網頁中包含隱藏欄位中儲存狀態資訊的類別和<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>儲存狀態中的類別<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A>與要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: Note that when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>隱藏的 VIEWSTATE 欄位仍轉譯因為這用來判斷回傳的類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 若要將狀態儲存在您選擇的位置，您應該建立新的子系<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>儲存和載入至持續性媒體狀態，您所選擇的類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立新的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>物件，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state in anything other than a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用.NET Framework 版本為 1.0 或 1.1，覆寫這個方法，如果您想要儲存<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>隱藏欄位以外的任何項目狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇這樣做，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> in which to store the view-state information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要儲存檢視狀態資訊。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the page has completed saving all view state and control state information for the page and controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面已完成儲存所有狀態和控制項的檢視狀態資訊頁面之後，就會發生，並控制在頁面上。

trans-unit.target: SaveStateComplete 引發的檢視狀態和頁面的控制項狀態之後，頁面上的控制項儲存至持續性中。

trans-unit.target: 目前<xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>與頁面相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref> object provided by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前<xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref> ASP.NET 所提供的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property provides information about the current request's session.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供目前要求的工作階段的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: A`Session`物件會維護每個使用者，從 ASP.NET 應用程式要求的頁面或文件。

trans-unit.source: Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application.
trans-unit.target: 變數會儲存在`Session`物件不會遭到捨棄當使用者將頁面從應用程式中; 相反地，這些變數會保存，只要使用者存取您的應用程式中的頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關工作階段狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The current session-state data.
trans-unit.target: 目前的工作階段狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the session information is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the SetFocus method to make the control with the specified ID string the active control in the Web page displayed by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的識別碼字串作用中的控制項將控制項設瀏覽器顯示的網頁中使用 SetFocus 方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SetFocus method will work only on browsers supporting ECMAScript version 1.3 or later.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SetFocus 方法只能在瀏覽器支援的 ECMAScript 版本 1.3 或更新版本上運作。

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SetFocus 方法只能在瀏覽器支援的 ECMAScript 版本 1.3 或更新版本上運作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string value is validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否要驗證查詢字串值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if query string validation should be skipped (the query string should not be validated); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if query string validation should take place as normal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該略過查詢字串的驗證 （查詢字串應該不會驗證）。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ，如果查詢字串驗證應放置正常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether smart navigation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用智慧型巡覽。

trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性已被取代。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 設定`SmartNavigation`屬性`true`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中。

trans-unit.source: When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別就會設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In ASP.NET version 2.0, the SmartNavigation property is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，SmartNavigation 屬性已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SetFocus%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - Eliminating the flash caused by navigation.
trans-unit.target: 當 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 瀏覽器要求網頁時，或更新版本中，智慧瀏覽增強藉由執行下列的經驗的頁面:-消除 flash 巡覽所造成。

trans-unit.source: - Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page.
trans-unit.target: -移動 頁面時，保存捲軸位置。

trans-unit.source: - Persisting element focus between navigations.
trans-unit.target: -保存的項目焦點之間巡覽。

trans-unit.source: - Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history.
trans-unit.target: -保留在瀏覽器的歷程記錄只有最後一個頁面狀態。

trans-unit.source: Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return.
trans-unit.target: 具有需要時常回傳、 ASP.NET 網頁，但不會變更大幅在傳回的視覺內容，是最適合用智慧型巡覽。

trans-unit.source: Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要將此屬性設定為時仔細考慮這`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if smart navigation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用智慧型巡覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the theme that is applied to the page early in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至網頁，在頁面生命週期的早期的佈景主題的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是指直接階層式樣式表 (CSS)。

trans-unit.source: The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it.
trans-unit.target: 屬性包含 ASP.NET 佈景主題，其中可以包括 CSS 檔案中的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The StyleSheetTheme property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: StyleSheetTheme 屬性指定的早期頁面生命週期中，套用至頁面的佈景主題名稱，而<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A>屬性會指定在稍後頁面生命週期中套用至頁面的佈景主題名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，頁面上的設定優先於樣式表主題中的設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面指示詞中，或藉由覆寫屬性，通常會設定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: For information, see the following topics: - [How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))
trans-unit.target: 詳細資訊，請參閱下列主題:- [How to︰ 適用於 ASP.NET 主題](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to︰ 適用於 ASP.NET 的佈景主題以程式設計的方式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))

trans-unit.source: The name of the theme that is applied to the page early in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面生命週期的早期套用至網頁佈景主題的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the StyleSheetTheme property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定 StyleSheetTheme 屬性之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>

trans-unit.source: StyleSheetTheme is set to an invalid theme name.
trans-unit.target: StyleSheetTheme 設定為無效的佈景主題名稱。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*> method is called, not by the property setter.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況時擲回<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>呼叫方法時，不是由屬性 setter。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.FrameworkInitialize*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the page theme.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面主題的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Theme property sets the name of the theme used for the page.
trans-unit.target: 佈景主題屬性設定頁面所用的佈景主題的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you want the settings on the page to take precedence over the settings in the theme, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要優先於佈景主題中的設定的設定頁面上，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.StyleSheetTheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Theme property must be set prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event; setting the Theme property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 之前，必須設定佈景主題屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件; 設定之後的佈景主題屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件會導致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>

trans-unit.source: The specified theme must exist as either an application or a global theme.
trans-unit.target: 指定佈景主題必須存在於應用程式或全域主題。

trans-unit.source: If the theme does not exist, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果主題不存在，<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the page theme.
trans-unit.target: 網頁主題名稱。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set Theme after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref> event has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定佈景主題之後<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit"></xref>已發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Theme is set to an invalid theme name.
trans-unit.target: 主題已設定為無效的佈景主題名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title for the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面的標題。

trans-unit.source: Use the Title property to set the page title in the HTML header sent to the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Title 屬性來設定頁面標題 HTML 標頭傳送到提出要求的瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The page must contain a `head` element that has the attribute `runat="server"`, otherwise the title will not render.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 網頁必須包含`head`具有屬性的項目`runat="server"`，否則標題將不會呈現。

trans-unit.source: The title of the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的標題。

trans-unit.source: The Title property requires a header control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Title 屬性必須有標題控制項在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>目前 Web 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤會追蹤，並顯示 Web 要求的相關執行詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在轉譯頁面的追蹤資料，您必須啟用頁面或應用程式層級的追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Tracing on a page is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 預設為停用頁面上的追蹤。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing for a page, use the directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用網頁的追蹤，請使用指示詞`<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。

trans-unit.source: To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用追蹤整個應用程式，您必須應用程式的組態檔中，位於應用程式的根目錄中的 Web.config 中啟用它。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Data from the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object for the current Web request.
trans-unit.target: 從資料<xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref>目前 Web 要求的物件。

trans-unit.target: 設定值，指出是否已啟用追蹤<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.target: 設定`Trace`屬性`true`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中。

trans-unit.target: 要求頁面時，動態產生的類別設定的屬性。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果追蹤已啟用頁面;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 設定頁面顯示的追蹤陳述式的模式。

trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，程式碼中設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.target: 設定`TraceMode`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also explicitly set the value of the UICulture property in the of the Web.config file.

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique suffix to append to the file path for caching browsers.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯一的尾碼附加到瀏覽器快取的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The UniqueFilePathSuffix property returns a string that is appended to the end of a file path when required for caching browsers.
trans-unit.target: UniqueFilePathSuffix 屬性會傳回附加至時快取的瀏覽器所需的檔案路徑結尾的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string is used to identify the file path associated with a specific request.
trans-unit.target: 字串用來識別與特定要求相關聯的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: A unique suffix appended to the file path.

trans-unit.source: The default is "__ufps=" plus a unique 6-digit number.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"__ufps ="加上唯一的 6 位數數字。

trans-unit.source: Stops persistence of control state for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 停止指定之控制項的控制項狀態的持續性。

trans-unit.source: Custom server controls that use control state must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> on each request during before the state is persisted.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項狀態的自訂伺服器控制項必須呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>期間之前的每個要求保存狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Registration for control state is not carried over from request to request during a postback.
trans-unit.target: 控制項狀態的註冊不會保存從要求的要求在回傳期間。

trans-unit.source: Use the UnregisterRequiresControlState method to ensure that control state is not persisted for controls that no longer need to be persisted for postback.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UnregisterRequiresControlState 方法，以確保不再需要保存回傳的控制項不會保存控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the UnregisterRequiresControlState method is invoked when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A> method to remove a control from a controls collection.
trans-unit.target: 就內部而言，UnregisterRequiresControlState 方法會叫用使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>方法以從控制項集合移除的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> for which to stop persistence of control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>要停止的控制項狀態的持續性。

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
